--- Astroblast ---

Astroblast leaps up, detransforming all the way, and he sights his 
tergets retreating. "Cowards, Haha, NOW I've got you DEAD!" He 
aims his Ionic Displacer rifle, and is about to fire a shot, when a 
charge comes out of nowhere and smashes into his shoulder 
armour, knocking him out of flight. "Arghh, what was that," he yells 
furiously, spotting the bot who'd interupted his fun. He gets up, and 
then picks up his rifle, which he'd dropped when he was blasted out 
of the sky.



On 15 May 2001, at 7:41, Alloran2@... wrote:

> :::Torca/Ratchet/Sidseswipe/Orion/Hun-Grr:::
> 
> ::They hear Iron Raptor's transmission::
> Torca: I say we fight!
> ::Ratchet nods::
> Ratchet: Yeah! Give 'em somethin' to think about!
> ::My Maximals charge into battle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca switches his gun to charge launcher and fires a charge at
> Astroblast:: ~~~~~ ::Ratchet fires 8(semi-automatic) shots from each
> of his two guns at Sinnertwin:: ~~~~~ ::Sideswipe fired 2 missles at
> Nightstrike:: ~~~~~ ::Orion looked to Hun-Grr:: Orion: Ready for round
> two? Hun-Grr: This time, Hun-Grr destroy you! Orion: I don't think so.
> ::They fired at each other::
>
